de.awi.floenavigation.admin

Class ListViewActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • de.awi.floenavigation.helperclasses.ActionBarActivity
              • de.awi.floenavigation.admin.ListViewActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class ListViewActivity
extends ActionBarActivity
    ListViewActivity is responsible for displaying a list of static stations and fixed stations depending on the intent extra received from the calling activity RecoveryActivity.onClickViewDeployedStations(View) Added feature of swipping right on the entry present in the list will recover/delete the corresponding station from the internal local database tables

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int[] baseStnMMSI
      Array to store the base stations used to initially set up the grid
      private android.content.Intent intentOnExit
      Intent variable used to store the intent activity which is to be started when the station/user is removed
      private android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter mAdapter
      List view adapter to be used by mRecyclerView Used for notifying the position of the item removed from the list
      private android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager mLayoutManager
      Grid layout manager to be used by mRecyclerView
      private android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView mRecyclerView
      Recycler view used to display scrolling list of elements
      private java.util.ArrayList<ParameterListObject> parameterObjects
      Object is used to store different parameters in case of fixed station recovery the name of the station and the x, y positions of the station in the grid This helps in displaying the contents on the list
      private static java.lang.String TAG

      Returns the base stations used for initial grid setup

      Checks whether the static station name is part of the stations installed on the grid

      Checks whether the mmsi is part of the stations installed on the grid
      private boolean checkEntryInWaypointsTable(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db, java.lang.String waypointToBeRemoved)
      Checks whether the waypoint is part of the waypoints installed on the grid
      private void deleteEntry(java.lang.String callingActivityString, int position, long numOfStations)
      This method is called from ItemTouchHelper callback in onCreate(Bundle) The Listener is called when the admin or the user swipes the element in the list Depending on the calling activity, the local variable flag isRemoved is initialized If the flag is set to true, the entry is removed from the list
      private boolean deleteEntryfromDBTables(java.lang.String mmsiToBeRemoved)
      This function is called from deleteEntry(String, int, long) (String)} Based on the mmsi of the station, its entry from the local internal database is removed Also inserts the mmsi into the deleted tables insertIntoFixedStationDeletedTable(SQLiteDatabase, String), insertIntoBaseStationDeletedTable(SQLiteDatabase, String)} insertIntoStationListDeletedTable(SQLiteDatabase, String) which is later used for synchronization purpose
      private boolean deleteEntryfromStaticStnTableinDB(java.lang.String stationToBeRemoved)
      This function is called from deleteEntry(String, int, long) (String)} Based on the static station name, its entry from the local internal database is removed Also inserts the static station name into the static station deleted table insertIntoStaticStationDeletedTable(SQLiteDatabase, String), which is later used for synchronization purpose
      private boolean deleteEntryfromUsersTableinDB(java.lang.String name)
      This function is called from deleteEntry(String, int, long) (String)} Based on the user name, its entry from the local internal database is removed Also inserts the user name into the deleted tables insertIntoUsersDeletedTable(SQLiteDatabase, String), which is later used for synchronization purpose
      private boolean deleteEntryfromWaypointsTableinDB(java.lang.String waypointToBeRemoved)
      This function is called from deleteEntry(String, int, long) (String)} Based on the waypoint label ID, its entry from the local internal database is removed Also inserts the waypoint name into the waypoint deleted table insertIntoWaypointsDeletedTable(SQLiteDatabase, String), which is later used for synchronization purpose

      Inserts the mmsi to be removed into the DatabaseHelper.baseStationDeletedTable

      Inserts the static station name to be removed into the DatabaseHelper.staticStationDeletedTable

      Inserts the mmsi to be removed into the DatabaseHelper.stationListDeletedTable
      private void insertIntoUsersDeletedTable(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db, java.lang.String user)
      Inserts the user name to be removed into the DatabaseHelper.userDeletedTable
      private void insertIntoWaypointsDeletedTable(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db, java.lang.String labelID)
      Inserts the waypoint label ID to be removed into the DatabaseHelper.waypointDeletedTable

      Initializes the layout and the recycler view mRecyclerView Listener initialization for the swipe event in case of removal Paint method added for the animation and the layout of the element in the list
      boolean onOptionsItemSelected(android.view.MenuItem item)
      Return back to the calling activity
      private void updataMMSIInDBTables(int mmsi, android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db, boolean originFlag)
      If the removed station is one of the base station that was used for initial grid setup Change the mmsi number to either DatabaseHelper.BASESTN1 or DatabaseHelper.BASESTN2 based on whether the station is origin or x-axis base station.

        Parameters:

      • deleteEntry

        private void deleteEntry(java.lang.String callingActivityString,
                         int position,
                         long numOfStations)
        This method is called from ItemTouchHelper callback in onCreate(Bundle) The Listener is called when the admin or the user swipes the element in the list Depending on the calling activity, the local variable flag isRemoved is initialized If the flag is set to true, the entry is removed from the list
        Parameters:
        callingActivityString - the name of the calling activity
        position - position of the entry in the list
        numOfStations - Only required for logging purpose

      • getCallingActivityName

        private java.lang.String getCallingActivityName()
        Function to determine the name of the activity from which the list view is called Depending on the name of the activity mAdapter and intentOnExit are initialized
        Returns:
        returns the name of the calling activity

        private long getNumOfAISStation()
        Internal local database access to determine number of fixed ais stations installed
        Returns:
        the number of fixed ais stations

      • deleteEntryfromWaypointsTableinDB

        private boolean deleteEntryfromWaypointsTableinDB(java.lang.String waypointToBeRemoved)
        This function is called from deleteEntry(String, int, long) (String)} Based on the waypoint label ID, its entry from the local internal database is removed Also inserts the waypoint name into the waypoint deleted table insertIntoWaypointsDeletedTable(SQLiteDatabase, String), which is later used for synchronization purpose
        Parameters:
        waypointToBeRemoved - waypoint label ID
        Returns:
        true if successful in deleting the entry from the database false otherwise

      • deleteEntryfromStaticStnTableinDB

        private boolean deleteEntryfromStaticStnTableinDB(java.lang.String stationToBeRemoved)
        This function is called from deleteEntry(String, int, long) (String)} Based on the static station name, its entry from the local internal database is removed Also inserts the static station name into the static station deleted table insertIntoStaticStationDeletedTable(SQLiteDatabase, String), which is later used for synchronization purpose
        Parameters:
        stationToBeRemoved - static station name to be removed
        Returns:
        true if successful in deleting the entry from the database false otherwise

      • deleteEntryfromDBTables

        private boolean deleteEntryfromDBTables(java.lang.String mmsiToBeRemoved)
        This function is called from deleteEntry(String, int, long) (String)} Based on the mmsi of the station, its entry from the local internal database is removed Also inserts the mmsi into the deleted tables insertIntoFixedStationDeletedTable(SQLiteDatabase, String), insertIntoBaseStationDeletedTable(SQLiteDatabase, String)} insertIntoStationListDeletedTable(SQLiteDatabase, String) which is later used for synchronization purpose
        Parameters:
        mmsiToBeRemoved - mmsi to be removed
        Returns:
        true if successful in deleting the entry from the database false otherwise

      • deleteEntryfromUsersTableinDB

        private boolean deleteEntryfromUsersTableinDB(java.lang.String name)
        This function is called from deleteEntry(String, int, long) (String)} Based on the user name, its entry from the local internal database is removed Also inserts the user name into the deleted tables insertIntoUsersDeletedTable(SQLiteDatabase, String), which is later used for synchronization purpose
        Parameters:
        name - user name to be removed
        Returns:
        true if successful in deleting the entry from the database false otherwise

        Parameters:

      • updataMMSIInDBTables

        private void updataMMSIInDBTables(int mmsi,
                                  android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                  boolean originFlag)
        If the removed station is one of the base station that was used for initial grid setup Change the mmsi number to either DatabaseHelper.BASESTN1 or DatabaseHelper.BASESTN2 based on whether the station is origin or x-axis base station. This is done so that PredictionService can keep on predicting the positions of these stations and the grid/coordinate system remains intact Also these mmsi's could be used for redeployment at a different point on the grid
        Parameters:
        mmsi - mmsi
        db - SQLiteDatabase object
        originFlag - true if the mmsi is of origin base station false otherwise, if the mmsi is of x-axis base station

      • checkEntryInStationListTable

        private boolean checkEntryInStationListTable(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                             java.lang.String mmsi)
        Checks whether the mmsi is part of the stations installed on the grid
        Parameters:
        db - SQLiteDatabase object
        mmsi - mmsi
        Returns:
        true if the mmsi is present in the internal local database false otherwise

      • checkEntryInWaypointsTable

        private boolean checkEntryInWaypointsTable(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                           java.lang.String waypointToBeRemoved)
        Checks whether the waypoint is part of the waypoints installed on the grid
        Parameters:
        db - SQLiteDatabase object
        waypointToBeRemoved - waypoint label ID
        Returns:
        true if the waypoint is present in the internal local database false otherwise

      • checkEntryInStaticStnTable

        private boolean checkEntryInStaticStnTable(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                           java.lang.String stationToBeRemoved)
        Checks whether the static station name is part of the stations installed on the grid
        Parameters:
        db - SQLiteDatabase object
        stationToBeRemoved - static station name
        Returns:
        true if the static station is present in the internal local database false otherwise

      • generateDataFromWaypointsTable

        private java.util.ArrayList<ParameterListObject> generateDataFromWaypointsTable()
        Used to populate each entry in the list from the data extracted from the database
        Returns:
        Returns DatabaseHelper.labelID, DatabaseHelper.xPosition, DatabaseHelper.yPosition of the waypoint

      • generateDataFromSamplesTable

        private java.util.ArrayList<ParameterListObject> generateDataFromSamplesTable()
        Used to populate each entry in the list from the data extracted from the database
        Returns:
        Returns DatabaseHelper.labelID, DatabaseHelper.updateTime, DatabaseHelper.xPosition, DatabaseHelper.yPosition of the sample or the measurement taken

      • generateDataFromFixedStnTable

        private java.util.ArrayList<ParameterListObject> generateDataFromFixedStnTable()
        Used to populate each entry in the list from the data extracted from the database
        Returns:
        Returns DatabaseHelper.mmsi, DatabaseHelper.stationName, DatabaseHelper.xPosition, DatabaseHelper.yPosition of the fixed station

      • generateDataFromStaticStnTable

        private java.util.ArrayList<ParameterListObject> generateDataFromStaticStnTable()
        Used to populate each entry in the list from the data extracted from the database
        Returns:
        Returns DatabaseHelper.staticStationName, DatabaseHelper.xPosition, DatabaseHelper.yPosition of the static station

      • generateDataUsersTable

        private java.util.ArrayList<ParameterListObject> generateDataUsersTable()
        Used to populate each entry in the list from the data extracted from the database
        Returns:
        Returns DatabaseHelper.userName of the user

        Return back to the calling activity
        Overrides:
        onOptionsItemSelected in class android.app.Activity
        Parameters:
        item - menu item clicked
        Returns:
        true if home button on the top menu bar is clicked false otherwise
